title: Big Five traits theory of personality

content.prompt: Which of the following summarizes the Big Five theory of personality?

choices.label: People must satisfy five basic needs before they can address their need for self-actualization.
People must pass through the oral, anal, phallic, and genital stages before reaching the fifth and final stage of personality development.
People who are psychologically healthy score high on five different dimensions of personality.
People can be described by five higher-order traits that reflect most aspects of personality.

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
